faqQuestions.question: How does Extramile Play's pricing work?
faqQuestions.answer: After your free trial ends, you have some options. If you want to continue using Extramile Play, you can choose a paid plan. Or, if you feel strange extenuating circumstances kept you from really feeling the Extramile play during your free trial, you can request an extension. Once your free trial ends, you will not be able to access any of the content you created during your free trial. The good news is your content doesn’t disappear into a black hole; when you subscribe to a paid plan, you regain access to all your content.

gettingStarted.question: How do I sign in?
gettingStarted.answer: Use your official email id to sign in. Just have access to it for an instant OTP. Got to keep it secure by knowing it’s you! Smooth and simple, no need for age-old password creations.

gettingStarted.question: How can my users sign in?
gettingStarted.answer: Just have them log in using their own official email ids. And they must immediately access their email for an OTP verification.

gettingStarted.question: How can I test the games for free?
gettingStarted.answer: Absolutely! Simply choose the game of your liking, click on “Play Demo”, and you are on! The demo will give you a sneak peek into the game quickly and crisply.

gettingStarted.question: How many ready-to-play games are available?
gettingStarted.answer: A whopping 50! And each comes with its own quirks and rules. What’s more? We plan to keep adding more ready-to-play games of different genres, themes and content every month. You will be spoilt for choice indeed!

gettingStarted.question: Who can schedule or start games?
gettingStarted.answer: So, your Admin has the main access to choose games for the dashboard, over and above the default games. But you know what? Our aim is for all users to take over their own fun-quotient and enjoy playing their choice of games with their work-buddies. So, take charge and schedule/start games on your own. We shouldn’t wait for HR to do everything now, should we?

gettingStarted.question: How long does it take to start a new game?
gettingStarted.answer: Approximately 75 seconds, in our experience. That's, of course, after you have narrowed down on which game to play. Heads up: it may take you some time to choose one though, they are all so much fun!

gettingStarted.question: Can I use the games to do LIVE events on Zoom, MS Teams etc?
gettingStarted.answer: Yes, of course. We want you to enjoy LIVE experiences with these games on any VC platform. That’s the whole essence of virtual games, connecting you and your friends from anywhere and at any time digitally.

gettingStarted.question: Are there single or multi-player games?
gettingStarted.answer: To begin with, we have games that need to be self-played. The leaderboard is the ultimate fun, with everyone's score being ranked and everyone wanting to beat the rest. We are going to make the multi-player games like chess, carrom and more available in a jiffy!

gettingStarted.question: Can I customize the games?
gettingStarted.answer: We are on it, one step at a time. Enjoy our ready-made and pre-programmed games for now; oodles to explore there! Meanwhile, we shall come back with version 2.0 by next month that will allow you to customise the branding on your game page and the game content.

pricingAndPlans.question: Are games restricted on any plans?
pricingAndPlans.answer: Restricted fun? No, we’d never do that! You are free to enjoy all 50 games on all plans. And the number will increase as we keep adding more games.

pricingAndPlans.question: Is the billing per user?
pricingAndPlans.answer: Rather, it depends on the maximum number of users; for example, up to 100 users, up to 500 users, up to 1000 users, etc. Click here to check out the plans.

pricingAndPlans.question: Why should I opt for the annual plan over others?
pricingAndPlans.answer: The same reason why you probably pay for Netflix or Amazon Prime for a year. It's a steal deal, what else! And might we add, engagement and fun should be all year round, right?

pricingAndPlans.question: What if I cross my user limit?
pricingAndPlans.answer: That’s fantastic news then! More the merrier, right? With no further delay, upgrade your plan to share access to a larger user base and spread the fun and joy!

pricingAndPlans.question: Can I change/upgrade plans mid-way?
pricingAndPlans.answer: Of course, you can! We are targeting seamless fun; we wouldn’t like to restrict it. So, choose the new plan and switch absolutely any time. Thank us later!

pricingAndPlans.question: Can I pay offline?
pricingAndPlans.answer: Sure, can do, if you want to take that pain, that is. Just drop in a word or choose “Offline Payment” on the Plans page. We will then get in touch, complete the old-school invoicing process with your procurement team and sort it out for you. PS: Online is just hassle-free and quicker, you know. Just saying!

dataProtectionAndPrivacy.question: What browsers do the games support?
dataProtectionAndPrivacy.answer: Just don’t get us started on Internet Explorer and their versions! Time to upgrade to Microsoft Edge or Google Chrome, people!

dataProtectionAndPrivacy.question: Are the games responsive on all devices?
dataProtectionAndPrivacy.answer: Absolutely. Tried, tested and equally responsive on any device. We wouldn't have it any other way. For us, it is all about seamless user experience.

dataProtectionAndPrivacy.question: How do I get data on participation, feedback, and leaderboards?
dataProtectionAndPrivacy.answer: Find ‘My Games’ on your profile, click on it, and you shall find a plethora of reports on all the games you have initiated. And if you have Admin / Owner access, you can view reports of games scheduled by all users, map the traffic, find out which games are the top picks too!

dataProtectionAndPrivacy.question: How do I protect my user data?
dataProtectionAndPrivacy.answer: We take user data protection very seriously. Our authentication and authorisation algorithms for this purpose are very sophisticated and strong, and we are continuously enhancing them as well. All the users’ data is authenticated and made accessible only to the company admins and other authorised persons. So, while you play and have fun, pay absolutely no heed to data protection because we are already on it!

dataProtectionAndPrivacy.question: What can I show my IT & Security teams for their approval?
dataProtectionAndPrivacy.answer: Leave that to us I Get us the list of questions from your IT and security team, and we shall answer them at length for you. We are using quite the standard and proven security protocols. Our site is secured with high standard extended validation certificates. We’ll be happy to answer any further questions.

dataProtectionAndPrivacy.question: Do I need to whitelist the webpage for any firewalls?
dataProtectionAndPrivacy.answer: We’d certainly hope to be whitelisted! But you need to do this only if you are using the office network Or a VPN using a customised firewall. Your IT team can help you with this. Ask away!

dataProtectionAndPrivacy.question: Where is the data being stored?
dataProtectionAndPrivacy.answer: We are very possessive & sensitive about our data. You will be happy to know that we store it on our servers in a distributed manner. Our data servers are highly secured and are protected by multiple micro applications, with properly scheduled backups. So, you have nothing to worry about!
